Let’s spar once we’ve restored our Vigor.

Horses like eating grass， while monkeys eat pinecones or plums. Ferrets and snakes like eating meat or eggs， but eagles just like meat.
As long as there is a Kungfu Contest around， it will be held periodically. I'm looking forward to it~ If I can become Champion， I can do whatever I want， hahahaha.
There’s a Bulletin Board at the gates of every sect. You can take a look， see if you meet their entry requirements. But they might think you're not good enough~
If your injury is minor， you can treat it with the flow of your Chi. If it's too serious， a clinic can treat you， but the fees can be quite expensive...
I've done trading， commissions， and errands at various shops. But nothing pays better then the extraordinary， haha， 'a horse can't grow fat without extra feed at night'~
Hehe~ no one is invincible in this world~ You can get stronger by collecting Skills， Inner Kungfu， Abilities， and Gear， but only by matching them well can you gain true power.
I heard that you can learn advanced Qinggong at the Eagle Hunt Platform and Mirror Lake Stonewoods.
Hand over everything you owe me！
You know what I mean， get out！ Be careful next time， and don't mess with me！
I'll teach you a lesson today！
I can't afford to offend you！ Let's just forget about this！
I'm tired today， come and see me tomorrow.
I'm tired today， I need to master what we just covered. Let's continue tomorrow.
(...Don't move...If I hold on a little longer， the Heavenly Gate will open！)
Not bad， Note bad， I bet you can unify the Jianghu.
Haha， I just invented it， but didn’t expect any side effects. I’ll come back to you when I improve it~
Hmph~ Don't say I didn't warn you.
Good day， sir~  May you live a long and healthy life~
I'm so kind~ I can't bear to see children more pitiful then me~
You really are~ I cried~ The mountains are high and the waters long， we'll meet again in the Jianghu~
It's as if Bodhisattva descended！ Thanks！
The cold wind is howling~ The white snow is falling~
I met a blind person... I pity them~
Of course， you need two good legs！ My wisdom is beyond yours， hahahaha！
No matter your martial skill， you'll fear a kitchen knife. Can you avoid slander， gossip， and backstabbing？
The noble value righteousness， while villians eye silver and gold. If you use money to control someone， their betrayal is inevitable.
Indeed， we're two of the same！
Now this is what you call sticking together in thick and thin！ hahaha！
Not bad， not bad， I've matched 38 couples this year.
I will repay your life-saving grace with gratitude！ This is my ancestral elixir， please accept it.
My leg is broken！ Give me 1000 coins！ Or I’ll find the seniors and accuse you of bullying me！
Alas~ Business is getting harder and harder~

Oh， I thought you were new here.
Haha， looks like you're smart enough~ I'll see you later.
Looks like you need to be taught a lesson！
Good！ From this day on， we resolve to band together to face whatever lies ahead！
Hmph！ You don't know how to appreciate my kindness.
Nice~
Hmph！
Put this on quickly， you need to keep warm. Don't let yourself get ailments.
I'd rather save face and suffer， Goodbye.
Once you build a house， you will have a place to stay. You can resist the cold and restore your Vigor！
Having a hot spring bath， drinking tea in a teahouse， or listening to music in a music house can all restore your spirits！
Really！？！ Thanks in advance， hahaha！ When I master it， I'll definitely share it with you！
The Skill in this manual is rumored to be the strongest. Don't you really want to find out？！
This strange stone lies on the Dragonhead in Longting. As for how to get there， figure it out yourself！
If you don't believe it， forget it！
Here， here， I'll mark the location for you， go look for it.

While your skills may be good， your will mustn't be weak. Practice diligently and never be arrogant.
The sole key to mastery lies in diligence. Practice hard， and you'll rise to greatness.
A prized technique cannot be mastered without diligence. Hone your gift with practice， and you'll be rewarded.
{0}， please wait！ There's a favor I'd like to ask of you！
{0}， wait！ There's something you need to know！
{0}， hold on， there's something I wish to discus！
{0}， wait！ Hear me out！
[0]， please wait！ I have urgent news to share！
By heaven and earth， in this life， I love only you！
I need nothing else but you. Let us grow old together， till death do us part.
My love runs deep as the sea. I entrust myself to you， till our hairs turn grey.
May the heaven and earth bear witness， I love you through life and death.
From this day forward， I pledge to stay by your side till the end of our lives.
{0}， come on， come on！ Follow me！
[#1you]， where are you taking me？
[#1you]， where are we going？
[#1you]， where are we headed？ What's the matter？
[#1you]， how far are we going？
Help！ My house is burning to the ground！
It's fire！ Put it out quickly！
Where is the arsonist？！ Are they going to kill us？！
Oh wow， what a bonfire. It'd be a disservice if we don't have some barbeque！
Seize the arsonist and burn them to ashes， so they find out how many eyes Ma Wang Ye has！
Cheers！
Drink up！
Ah， that’s some good wine！
Nothing lifts the spirits like a good ol' drink！
Life is short， live in the present！ Raise a glass and say bye to your worries！
It's a harsh world， only this drink offers solace！
All things are temporary， live in the moment！ Here's to my health！
There's good and bad in life， enjoy yourself when you can， never give up on being happy！
Life doesn't always go as planned. Better find joy when you can than to dwell on woes！
Life is but a dream， effort amounts to nothing. Seize the moment， a glass of wine， release the burdens of earthly confine.
Life floats like a dream， joy makes it higher. The wine in the pot is just as heavy.
Life and death are predestined， so are riches and fame. Enjoy your time， lest youth goes to waste.
Alas， the many autumns that have gone by. How the world ages！
The silkworm spun its thread， and honey has been made. Such peace and contentment- how can one fully capture it in just one season！
Flowers bloom and wither， the moon waxes and wanes. This life won't repeat， so let's drink to our heart's content.
The river flows， carrying memories of heroes. Life is a leaf adrift， caught in the draught of death. Here's to health， to joy in the moment.
Damned beggar， get out！
Get lost！ You worthless piece of trash！
Leave！ There's no charity for you here！
Shoo！ You're an eyesore！
What a nuisance！ Get lost！

If you want to be shameless， go and disappear！
I don't have a shred of pity for you.

You scumbag， I'll take you down！

What a heinous act of slaughter！ You demon！
I'm ending your atrocities， once and for all！
I can't bear to witness your vile deeds！

What an appalling crime！ You scum！
Your sins are unforgivable， you monster！
You rat， I already dislike you， don't make me teach you a lesson！
You again， scum！
It's that detestable face again！
You nuisance！ Just looking at you makes me puke！
People like you are disgusting！
Don't make a scene！ Hand over your belongings， and your life shall be spared！
You bastard， how dare you lay hands on me？ You're courting death！
You're insane to provoke me， you're overestimating your capabilities！
You idiot， you dare provoke me？ You really are insolent！
You dare challenge me？ You overestimate yourself！
You three-legged cat， you dare to provoke me？ You must be tired of living！
This hatred is undying， we can never reconcile. Today， you shall feel my wrath！
I'm determined to settle this blood debt today， once and for all！
Time to settle the score between us！
The hatred between us is as deep as the ocean. Today， you shall die！
I'll fight you to the death！
